body_html: Hi @pratyusha972, we don't want to limit the number of conferences that can be added — we want to limit the number of conferences which attendees can apply to in each conference raffle round. Sorry if this wasn't clear from #414.
body_text: Hi @pratyusha972, we don't want to limit the number of conferences that can be added — we want to limit the number of conferences which attendees can apply to in each conference raffle round. Sorry if this wasn't clear from #414.
body: Hi @pratyusha972, we don't want to limit the number of conferences that can be added — we want to limit the number of conferences which attendees can apply to in each conference raffle round. Sorry if this wasn't clear from https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/issues/414.
